mapper.insert: insert into bb_gift_layout (active, created, frame, iconLocation, modified, referenceGuid, referenceType, shelf, size, version, x, y, z, guid) values (#{active,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{created,jdbcType=DATE}, #{frame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, #{activityReference.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityReference.ownerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shelf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{x,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{y,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{z,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bb_gift_layout set active = #{active,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, frame = #{frame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iconLocation = #{iconLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=DATE}, referenceGuid = #{activityReference.guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referenceType = #{activityReference.ownerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shelf = #{shelf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, x = #{x,jdbcType=INTEGER}, y = #{y,jdbcType=INTEGER}, z = #{z,jdbcType=INTEGER} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select gl.*,md.location,coalesce(md.comment, m.body) as body from bb_gift_layout gl left join bb_media_meta_data md on gl.referenceguid = md.guid left join bb_message m on gl.referenceguid = m.guid where gl.guid = #{value} limit 1

(select gl.*, m.body as body, NULL as location, 0 as type, m.postDate as postDate from bb_message m, bb_message_meta_data md, bb_message_recipient r, bb_gift_layout gl where gl.referenceguid = m.guid and m.artifactMetaData_guid = md.guid and md.guid = r.messagemetadata_guid and m.virtualgift = true and m.acknowledged = #{acknowledged,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} and r.recipientguid = #{guid}) union (select gl.*, m.comment as body, m.location as location, 3 as type, m.postDate as postDate from bb_media_meta_data m, bb_media_recipient r, bb_gift_layout gl where gl.referenceguid = m.guid and r.media_guid = m.guid and m.virtualGift = true and m.acknowledged = #{acknowledged,jdbcType=BOOLEAN} and r.recipientguid = #{guid} ) order by postdate
